_header: I sigh when I sing / for sorrow that I see
_description: A song of the Passion — six 10-line stanzas

BodDig2.First Lines: Hi sike al wan hi singefor sorue þat hi se…
BodDig2.Last Lines: …for any worlde his winþat was so der hi boyt

BLHar2253.First Lines: I syke when y singe for sorewe þat y se…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…þat haþ vs duere boht he bring vs to
                    wynne
